name: PMICustomerCare
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: p. m. i. customer care
Developer Terms of Use
des:
PMI Customer Care is a skill created by the Project Management Institute to assist customers with contacting the organization regarding support for our existing products and services or accessing common frequently asked questions. 

- For a more personalized experience, please use the Alexa app to link your Amazon account with your PMI account.

PMI Customer Care Benefits:
• Access to membership, profile, and certification data
• Access to the Projectified® podcast (* NEW *)

Projectified® podcast is a lively forward-looking series of conversations about hot topics and emerging trends impacting the world of project managers, from digital transformation to artificial intelligence to career development. Each podcast episode includes insights and perspectives from senior and rising project managers, business leaders in Fortune 500 companies and startups, best-selling authors, top researchers and a wide range of leading-edge thinkers. All Projectified® episodes are free to download.

How to access the Projectified® podcast

• To get started say, "Alexa, open PMI Customer Care" 
• After the welcome message, say, "Play Projectified"

Don't forget to check back in regularly with the Projectified® podcast app to listen to our latest podcasts. We update our content regularly to keep you up-to-date with the latest industry news and insights!

Projectified Link:
https://www.pmi.org/learning/training-development/projectified-podcast
